JUDGES: Giovanni Bonello;Ján Šikuta;Lech Garlicki;Ledi Bianku;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives on LOC . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , Mr NORP PERSON of ORG , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant received a notice of intended prosecution pursuant to section CARDINAL of LAW DATE , requiring him to name the driver of his car on DATE . He confirmed that he had been driving his car at that time .
On DATE the police made a conditional offer of a fixed penalty amounting to GBP CARDINAL and a CARDINAL penalty point endorsement on his licence , which the applicant accepted and paid .
The relevant domestic law and practice is set out in O’Halloran and PERSON the GPE [ ORG ] , ORG . ORG , § § DATE , ORG DATE ...
